entities.description: Serious problems caused by cocaine use at home, work, or school in the past 12 months.
Arguments or other problems with family or friends caused or made worse by cocaine use in the past 12 months.
Continued cocaine use even though it caused arguments or problems with family or friends.
Situations where cocaine use increased the chances of getting physically hurt in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent experienced serious problems at home, work, or school due to cocaine use in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent had arguments or problems with family or friends caused or made worse by cocaine use in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent continued to use cocaine even though it caused arguments or problems with family or friends.
Indicates if the respondent experienced situations where cocaine use increased the chances of getting physically hurt in the past 12 months.
